      • blasting

        protected void blasting(java.util.function.Consumer<net.minecraft.data.IFinishedRecipe> consumer,
                        net.minecraft.util.IItemProvider in,
                        net.minecraft.util.IItemProvider out,
                        float exp,
                        int time)
        Adds a smelting recipe that can be performed in a regular furnace and a blast furnace. time and exp should be the values for the normal furnace. They'll be adjusted for the blast furnace automatically.
